name: gleamed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
gleam
to produce or reflect a small, bright light: He polished the table until it gleamed.
When eyes gleam, they shine in a way that expresses a particular emotion: His eyes gleamed with/in triumph.
